  • public class PEReHintScanner
extends ReHintScanner
    Scans for anomalies and malformations in a PE file.

        public static PEReHintScanner newInstance(java.io.File file)
        Parses the given file and creates a PEAnomalyScanner instance that has all scanning characteristics applied.

        Parameters:
        file - the pe file to scan for
        Returns:
        a PEReHintScanner instance with the traits applied from the boolean values

      • newInstance

        public static PEReHintScanner newInstance(PEData data,
                                          java.util.List<Anomaly> anomalies)
        Creates a PEReHintScanner instance that has all scanning characteristics applied.

        Parameters:
        data - the PEData object created by the PELoader
        anomalies - to avoid scanning for anomalies several times, provide the list
        Returns:
        a PEReHintScanner instance with the traits applied from the boolean values

      • scan

        public scala.collection.immutable.List<ReHint> scan()
        Scans the PE and returns a (scala-)list of the anomalies found. Returns an empty list if no traits have been added.

        Use getReHints for a Java compatible list.

        Specified by:
        scan in class ReHintScanner
        Returns:
        (scala-)list of rehints found

      • getReHints

        public java.util.List<ReHint> getReHints()

        Returns:
        list of rehints found
